Hotel.name: The St. Regis Saadiyat Island Resort, Abu Dhabi

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Abu Dhabi (Saadiyat Island), The St. Regis Saadiyat Island Resort is minutes from Manarat Al Saadiyat and UAE Pavilion. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Louvre Abu Dhabi and Port Zayed.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 377 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. After dipping into one of the 5 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Additional features include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 7 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 7 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. After dipping into one of the 5 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Additional features include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the 377 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Located in Abu Dhabi (Saadiyat Island), The St. Regis Saadiyat Island Resort is minutes from Manarat Al Saadiyat and UAE Pavilion. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Louvre Abu Dhabi and Port Zayed.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Manarat Al Saadiyat - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
UAE Pavilion - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Louvre Abu Dhabi - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Port Zayed - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
The Galleria - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Mina Mall - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Fish Market - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi
Khalifa Center - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Abu Dhabi Mall - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank - 7.2 km / 4.4 mi
Capital Garden - 8 km / 5 mi
The Corniche - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Zayed City Market - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Red Crescent Authority - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Al Hosn University - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Abu Dhabi (ZVJ-Abu Dhabi Bus Station) - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.) - 25.8 km / 16 mi

The preferred airport for The St. Regis Saadiyat Island Resort is Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
